name: Team 01 - Tambour
description:
[Page under construction]

Save the World with your Viking Drum! 🥁 Michel is about to destroy all life on earth. Defeat him with the power of your music! Unleash the spiritual energy of your almighty drum!

🕹️ HOW TO PLAY? 🕹️

Use your mouse to tap the note in rythm with the music.

Team 1 : Nintendo DS / Drum

Programmation: Arthur PEJOIANE - Hugo PETIT--VILLARD - Yoann CHEVANCE

Design: Arthur CABLÉ - Luana TRAN NGUYEN - Clément NOWACKI

Art: Mattheo BOIZET - Tanguy LECERF
